subject: Re: [junit] JUnit with Selenium-RC how to
msgSnippet: Hello Joshua, ... I don t know whether I understand you correctly. Can you show an example of a simple JUnit test that uses Selenium Core? Greetings, Malte
messageBody:
Hello Joshua,

Joshua Kerievsky wrote:
> In general, we much prefer Selenium Core to Selenium RC (which we had used
> for a while). You can write all your Selenium Core tests in JUnit and
> they'll run in the browsers. We even run our Se Core tests in parallel for
> maximum speed.

I don't know whether I understand you correctly.
Can you show an example of a simple JUnit test that uses Selenium Core?

Greetings,
Malte
